displaytitle: Four studies of a kneeling figure for the Angel Raphael leaving the House of Tobit
medium: Pen, brown ink and brown wash
creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
inscribed: Verso under backing: extensive letter fragment, not in Rosa's handwriting but perhaps address to him as Amico Car.mo.
